definition.name: terraform-unlock-state
definition.description: Force unlocks a Terraform remote state.
definition.author: Daniel Flook

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to the Terraform root module that defines the remote state to unlock

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.description: Terraform workspace to unlock the remote state for

inputs.name: backend_config
inputs.description: List of Terraform backend config values, one per line.

inputs.name: backend_config_file
inputs.description:
List of Terraform backend config files to use, one per line.
Paths should be relative to the GitHub Actions workspace

inputs.name: lock_id
inputs.description: The ID of the state lock to release.

evidence.reasoning: This action is specifically designed to manage Terraform remote state, which is a key aspect of infrastructure management and deployment processes.
